text: Cēsis is a town in Latvia with town rights since 1206. Its population was 17,170 in 2016. == Geography == The Gauja River flows through the city. The river and the city are located in the heart of the Gauja National Park. == Gallery == Image:Cēsu vecpilsēta.PNG|Cēsis skyline Image:Cesis Burg.jpg|The old castle == References == == Other websites == *website of the city Category:Towns in Latvia Category:1206 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Latvia
title: Cēsis
